enable_A_B_trade_C.label: Enable trade A B for C

enable_auto_actions.label: Enable Auto Actions
enable_auto_actions.description: Program actions to automatically trigger on conditions.

more_efficient_C.label: Efficient Trade for C
more_efficient_C.description: Add a more efficient trade to generate C.

enable_galop_process.label: Enable the GALop process
enable_galop_process.description: Produce D and A for a bit of C

enable_aduia_process.label: Enable the ADUIA Process
enable_aduia_process.description: Decomposes D into A and B
